marklogic.body:
What took these libtard troglodytes so long. They are just NOW trying to get Rush Off the air? LMAO. Funny thing is several of the advertisers that pulled their ads from Rush's show are now begging for their ad Spots again. All to no avail because of the high demand and limited slots of Rush's advertisers. Couldn't have happened to a nicer bunch of aholes!
In any event, this is only a first baby step in what the disgusting, anti-freedom, pro-dictatorship liberal left really wants: to put all Conservatives in gas chambers like those Brown Shirts did in Germany. First comes the quelling of speech and establishing RATs to spy on neighbors...then...
